price: Kako oni ne razmisle o Kur’anu, ili su im na srcima katanci!?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna am ʿalā qulūbin aqfāluhā
